reviews.review_msg: This was the hardest Econ class I've done. There was a little bit of coding with Dynare in Matlab,  math heavy readings, and 2 lengthy presentations. With all that said, this was the most enjoyable  economics class I've ever taken. She broadened my perspective and gave a taste of real macroeconomic work! Luba was always available for extra help.
Difficult to follow his notes. Helpful if you go see him. Assumes a higher level of math then is in prerequisites.
Intimidating at first, but a really fair marker. Be warned, there is a lot of work required for this class.

Dr. Santamaria is one of the most all-rounded professors I have had. Made a very dull topic very interesting and enjoyable. Dr. Santamaria is very knowledgeable and loves interacting with his students - unlike many other profs at SFU - he enjoys what he teaches and makes his classes a pleasure to attend. Ask him about the Argentina soccer team :P
